content: As an AI language model, I cannot provide specific recommendations for tax professionals or attorneys. However, you may want to consider doing a search for tax professionals and attorneys in your area who specialize in family law. You can also ask for referrals from friends, family members, or acquaintances who have gone through a similar situation. It's important to do your own research and evaluate several options before choosing a professional to work with. Additionally, many attorneys and tax professionals offer a free initial consultation, so you can speak with them and decide whether or not they are a good fit for your needs.
